        public void initHangManUI()
        This method initializes the language-specific game controls, which includes the three primary game screens.

      • loadImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image loadImage(java.lang.String imageName)

      • changeWorkspace

        public void changeWorkspace(HangManUI.HangManUIState uiScreen)
        This function selects the UI screen to display based on the uiScreen argument. Note that we have 3 such screens: game, stats, and help.
        Parameters:
        uiScreen - The screen to be switched to.

      • displaySecretWord

        public void displaySecretWord()
        This is a cheat that helps with testing. It displays the secret word in the window's title.

      • loadPage

        public void loadPage(javax.swing.JEditorPane jep,
                     Main.HangManPropertyType fileProperty)
        This method loads the HTML page that corresponds to the fileProperty argument and puts it into the jep argument for display.
        Parameters:
        jep - The pane that will display the loaded HTML.
        fileProperty - The file property, whose name can then be retrieved from the property manager.

      • updateHangMan

        public void updateHangMan(int wrongTimes)

      • loadRemoteHelpPage

        public void loadRemoteHelpPage(java.net.URL link)
        This method loads the link Web Page into the Help Screen's editor pane.
        Parameters:
        link - The Web Page to load.

      • resetUI

        public void resetUI()
        This function clears the UI when a new game is started, resetting the letter color buttons and clearing the guesses display.
